name: EL TRAIN GEMU
description:
For the BRACKEY'S 2023.1 Game Jam. A short game by Boken Party.

YOUR MISSION
Deliver a suitcase to Ferguson Station using your time travelling ability. Use the handbrake carriage to halt the train at Ferguson Station and complete your mission. Good luck.

YOUR ABILITY
Every time you lose all your health, time reverses to save you from inevitable death.

CONTROLS
Use "W" to jump. "A" and "D" to move. Left-click to throw your suitcase at oncoming enemies, and pick it back up to throw again.

Sorry about the bugs and missing sounds. We made this game in 3 days instead of 7...
